resources.string: It is a low-flow showerhead if there is a STAR certified mark on the showered.
On an average, a person takes a shower for 10 minutes.
STAR certified mark on toilet indicates dual-flush toilet.
On an average, a person uses the flush 5-8 times a day.
Check the STAR certification mark on the dishwasher.
Most of the people operate sprinklers for a duration of 10-30 minutes.
On an average, miscellaneous usage of water per person constitutes upto 40-70 gallons.
